```{r, eval = FALSE}
blogdata <- readxl::read_xlsx("blog-data.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(images = paste0("![](img/",img,")"),
         title_formatted = paste0('<h2 style="font-size:20px;"> [', 
                                        title,
                                        '](https://stat231-f21.github.io/blog_', 
                                        repo,
                                        ")</h2>"),
         abstract = paste0('<p style="color:black;font-size:14px;">', abstract, '</p>')) %>%
  mutate(text = paste(title_formatted, abstract, sep = "<br>")) %>%
  select(images, text)

colorpal <- c("774bb0","#ede6fb")
```
